bibl.title: The Date of P. Kell. I G. 62 and the Meaning of χωρίον.
bibl.note: 273/4 is the latest possible date for the tablet. The dominant sense of χωρίον is that of non-inundated land, primarily used for growing tree crops of various sorts, but especially vineyards, and sometimes also containing farm buildings or equipment.
bibl.seg: BAGNALL Roger S., The Date of P. Kell. I G. 62 and the Meaning of χωρίον.

273/4 is the latest possible date for the tablet. The dominant sense of χωρίον is that of non-inundated land, primarily used for growing tree crops of various sorts, but especially vineyards, and sometimes also containing farm buildings or equipment.
